message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I get $60, you get $40. It's a fair split to start.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still a good deal for you.
Okay, Bob, let's settle this.  I'll take my previous offer down to $55, you get your $45.  Time is money, and it's losing value!
I'm not budging much, my new offer is 58-42. Time is on my side.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is fair and we both walk away with something.  Deal?
